properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; Fulton, KY; Hickman, KY; Alexander, IL; Carlisle, KY; Ballard, KY; Pulaski, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 1 at 7:21PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri...
Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam affecting Pulaski and Ballard
Counties
Ohio River at Cairo affecting Alexander...Pulaski...Ballard...
Carlisle...Fulton...Hickman and Mississippi Counties

.The Ohio River will continue to slowly fall. Olmsted is now forecast to
drop below flood stage Thursday March 12th. Cairo will fall below flood
stage Friday March 13th.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Cairo
* until further notice.
* At  7:00 PM Sunday the stage was 44.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The River will continue to fall to a stage of 42.6 feet
by Tuesday morning.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
